translations: v.淤塞（silt 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: But only now are some of the DAMS of the colonial era being restored to use, after years of neglect and silting up.
sentences.translation: 多年失修和淤积后，人们到现在才开始对殖民时代的一些水坝进行维修。

sentences.sentence: Erosion can do major damage to water quality, silting streams and lakes and dumping fertilizers and pesticides into the water supply.
sentences.translation: 对水质而言，土地侵蚀确实是一个主要的危害，堵塞河流和湖泊及倾撒肥料和杀虫剂进入供水系统。

sentences.sentence: Originally a shallow bay adjoining the Qiantang River was gradually transformed into an inland lake by the silting-up of the outlet.
sentences.translation: 起初是一个连接钱塘江的浅海湾，慢慢地由出口的淤泥冲塞被转变成了内陆湖。
